name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with expertise in **.NET**, **C#**, and **Agile methodologies**. Highly skilled in developing robust and scalable applications using a diverse tech stack including **React**, **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, **Angular**, **Vue**, **RESTful APIs**, **GraphQL**, **SQL**, and **MongoDB**. Experience in cloud services and containerization with **Azure DevOps**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**. Recognized for delivering complex solutions in industries such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, achieving significant operational improvements through strong architecture and a focus on clean code.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed robust **RESTful APIs** and **GraphQL** services that improved application integration and data accuracy by **40%**, aligning with **SOA** principles for a seamless experience.
Designed and implemented a **microservices** architecture underpinned by **.NET** and **C#**, achieving a **95%** success rate in transaction processing and scalability.
Enhanced frontend interfaces utilizing **React**, **TypeScript**, and **JavaScript**, achieving a **30%** reduction in user completion times while prioritizing a responsive and intuitive UI/UX design.
Implemented containerization using **Docker** for microservices, which improved deployment efficiency across staging and production by optimizing service isolation.
Deployed and managed Kubernetes clusters on **Azure DevOps** to ensure seamless scalability and a **99.9%** uptime, automating deployment processes to enhance reliability.
Established CI/CD pipelines that accelerated deployment frequency by **80%** using **Git** and modern cloud-based solutions, reducing time to market for new features.
Leveraged **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies to ensure iterative development and continuous feedback in product enhancement cycles.

• Developed backend services using **Java** (Spring Boot) and **Node.js**, demonstrating proficiency in **RESTful APIs** and **Microservices**, while reducing response times for ticketing and customer support by **25%**.
• Designed a notification system with **Kafka** for real-time alerts, achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues, showcasing strong **SOA** skills.
• Created a customer insights dashboard using **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, incorporating **JavaScript** and enhancing resolution rates by **20%**.
• Automated testing and deployment with **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a consistent release process through **Agile** and **Scrum** methodologies.
• Deployed the platform on **AWS EC2** with **Docker** and **Terraform**, cutting infrastructure setup time by **50%**, demonstrating expertise in containerization and orchestration.

Designed and developed robust **RESTful APIs** using **Java (Spring Boot)**, achieving **98% uptime**.
Constructed the frontend application with **Angular**, enhancing load times by **40%**.
Executed comprehensive testing processes with **JUnit** and **Mockito**, which resulted in a **30% reduction in bugs**.
Enhanced user experience by optimizing frontend performance through techniques such as lazy loading and code splitting.
Successfully deployed solutions globally utilizing **AWS CloudFront** and **S3**, ensuring low-latency access and reliability.

skills:
**Programming Languages**
	Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, Python, SQL, Swift, Kotlin, C#, .NET

**Backend Frameworks**
	Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ, Microservices, SOA

**Frontend Frameworks**
	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest

**API Technologies**
	RESTful APIs, GraphQL

**Databases**
	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB, CosmosDB

**DevOps**
	Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, Azure DevOps

**Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3, Lambda), API Gateway, Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

**Other**
	Microservices, RESTful API design, CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile, Scrum
